description:
Organizational Design, Classification and Standardized Job Description Writing, on an as and when requested basis.

 There is no security requirement applicable for this Contract.

 Proposed period of contract: The period of the Contract is for two (2) years from date of award with the possibility of extending by up to one (1) additional one-year option period.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
### Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Solicitation #### Solicitation Number: 10212823 #### Solicitation Title: TASK Based Professional Services (TSPS) #### Solicitation Date: October 18, 2022 #### Closing Date: October 31, 2022, 2:00 PM #### Contracting Entity: Canadian Heritage #### Description: Canadian Heritage is seeking a Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) contract to support the organization's Human Resources Support Services (HRSS). The contract shall provide professional services, including organization design, classification, and standardized job description writing on an as-and-when-requested basis. #### Security Requirements: There are no security requirements applicable to this contract. #### Contract Term: The proposed contract term is two (2) years, with the possibility of extending by up to one (1) additional year. #### Geographical Location: The successful contractor shall provide services to the National Capital Region (NCR) and Ottawa. #### Language of the Contract: English and French. #### Access to Relevant Documents: The request for proposal document is available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/f41bd0198f6634dd13fbe716f4533a6a/10212823_npp_en.pdf #### Available Languages: English and French. It is highly recommended to carefully review the solicitation document, which can be accessed by following the link above. You can also ask questions prior to the closing date and time by contacting the contracting officer.
